data.title: Emma Thompson
data.text:
bridge is back

Renée Zellweger Is Returning for a Fourth Bridget Jones Movie

Franchise stars Hugh Grant and Emma Thompson are expected to join newcomers Chiwetel Ejiofor and Leo Woodall for Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy.

Style

Diane von Furstenberg, Candice Bergen, Emma Thompson, and More Get Their Final Yachts In

As yacht season comes to a close, who is getting their final trips in?

Relationship Advice

Emma Thompson Says that “Romantic Love Is a Myth”

The actor added that it can also be “quite dangerous,” despite being happily married for the last 20 years.

What Is Cinema?

The Art That Inspired 6 Major Filmmakers

A short story suggested by Martin Scorsese, a 1970s documentary, a photograph of the Blitz—inspiration came from many sources to create some of 2022’s best films.

Reunited

Colin Farrell and Emma Thompson on Loneliness and Legacy

The Banshees of Inisherin and Good Luck to You, Leo Grande stars bond over baggage. “We’re actors, for crying out loud. What use would we be if we had no issues?”

Awards Insider Exclusive

Emma Thompson Has Nothing Left to Hide

The British icon gives her first interview since Good Luck to You, Leo Grande was deemed Oscar-eligible—one sign of Hollywood changing. She’s ready for an industry overhaul.

Daredevil

Emma Stone Tells Prince William and Kate Middleton About Riding a Motorcycle Around Buckingham Palace

The Duke of Cambridge joked that he should have stopped the actress as “it’s very dangerous.”

Review

Disney’s Cruella Makes It Really Uncool to Be Unkind

This origin story fails its iconic character—and its audience.

REAL TALK

Kate Winslet, Unfiltered: “Because Life Is F--king Short”

The Oscar winner, whose powerful love story Ammonite debuts at the Toronto Film Festival this week, knows the industry can do better—and that she can too: “What the f--k was I doing working with Woody Allen and Roman Polanski?”

the business

Kelly McGillis and the Art of Being Blunt About Hollywood

In a recent interview, the actor said she was too “old and fat” to star in a Top Gun sequel—and she’s far from the only woman to get real about Hollywood’s impossible standards.

get over it

Emma Thompson Reminds Men “It’s Not Rocket Science” to Avoid Sexual Harassment

The Oscar-winning star also offered men such advice as “get a grip” and “shut up.”

kiss the ring

Late Night Clip: Watch Men Try, Fail to Prove Themselves to Emma Thompson

In this exclusive new clip from the Mindy Kaling movie, a group of men do their best to kiss the ring of a shrewd late-night host played by Thompson.

funny girl

Mindy Kaling’s Late Night Looks Like a Charming Devil Wears Prada Update

The first trailer for the writer-star’s upcoming comedy, also starring Emma Thompson, is finally here.

something to say

Why Emma Thompson Refused to Work for John Lasseter: “Why Would a Woman Want To?”

“If a man has made women at his companies feel undervalued and disrespected for decades, why should the women at his new company think that any respect he shows them is anything other than an act?”

exit plan

Emma Thompson Reportedly Left a Movie After John Lasseter Came on Board

The actress was recording a voice role for an upcoming Skydance Animation film, but reportedly stopped after Lasseter was tapped to run the company.

coming up

Nearly Half of Sundance 2019’s Features Were Directed by Women

Next year’s selection also features buzzy titles, like an adaptation of Richard Wright’s Native Son and Shia LaBeouf’s biopic.
